channel.title: Projects on Paarth's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Paarth's Blog

item.description:
• Deep Learning Projects

    1. ByteNet - Tensorflow

      Implemented the dilated convolutional ByteNet model of neural machine translation from the paper Neural Machine Translation in Linear Time .

    2. Text To Image Synthesis Using Thought Vectors

      Generative Adversarial Text to Image Synthesis using skip-thought vectors. Implemented the GAN-CLS algorithm from the paper Generative Adversarial Text to Image Synthesis and conditioned the model using text-embeddings from Skip Thought Vectors.

      Caption Generated Images
      the flower shown has yellow anther red pistil and bright red petals
      this flower has petals that are yellow, white and purple and has dark lines
      the petals on this flower are white with a yellow center
      this flower has a lot of small round pink petals.
      this flower is orange in color, and has petals that are ruffled and rounded.
      the flower has yellow petals and the center of it is brown

    3. Visual Question Answering in Tensorflow

      Implemented the VIS-LSTM model of Visual Question Answering from the paper Exploring Models and Data for Image Question Answering.

  • RTIFeed

    Web platform to share authentic information fetched from government departments by exercising the Right to Information Act in India. To know more about RTIFeed visit rtifeed.com/about.

  • Blue Water Trade Winds Pvt Ltd

    Developed marine optimization softwares BOSS and e-Therm with an small enthusiastic team of software engineers at this marine consultancy company, owned by my father.

    1. BOSS - Blue Water Optimum Speed Services

      BOSS is a ship route optimization and speech scheduling online service. BOSS models ship’s reponses to weather and relations between engine RPM, speed and weather factors. BOSS uses this model to simulate the voyage in a bounded ocean-grid indexed with weather. Based on this simulation, BOSS uses a dynamic programming algorithm to plan the most optimum route and speed schedule in the forecast weather.

    2. e-Therm for Cargo Heating Management

      Developed a cargo temperature simulation tool for planning an optimum heating schedule for tanker ships carrying heated cargo oil. Blue Water Received the Lloydâ€™s List Intelligence Big Data Award for this project.
